metadata.name: Comfort Flower
metadata.description:
3D Character and toy designer, Cattyum displays the iconic smiley with a flower, drawing on Smileyâ€™s heritage association to optimism and positive energy. The comfort flower is a reminder that despite the chaos that daily surrounds us, we can bring our attention to the things we have control over. When we find comfort in the chaos we can put the focus on meaningful things that matter most.

This NFT comes with the entire 4 piece shirt collection from Pacsun x Smiley x Digify(while supplies last). Please Email us at info@digify.xyz upon purchase to redeem. (Only available once upon redemption).
